relation: There are stations where campus police can be contacted immediately. Police continually drive around in cars or on bikes.
There are a lot of options if your considering going Greek.
I know that I pay much less than most of my friends when it comes to schooling. I also was able to get money for an academic scholarship. Most events are open to students for free.
Topeka is a major city so you can always find something to do. There are also multiple events held at Washburn.
There is a lot of options when it comes to dining. There is always a station that changes daily to weekly with different food options.
The dorms are really nice. Most of of them are suite to single room style. There are also apartment style housing. Each floor and wing also has their own kitchen to use. RA's are always available.
Since classes are smaller their is a lot more one on one attention so that curriculum may not seem as hard even though you are learning the same amount to even more at a bigger school.

Washburn has a great programs such as Nursing, Radiology, and Law. It also has many majors other schools don't carry. If your looking to learn a lot while having a small class size check out Washburn.
I love Washburn. Its a great school. The students and faculty are always wanting to see you succeed.
pageTitle: Washburn University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {8102=Washburn is ranked in the top 10 of the 2010 U.S. News and World Report America's Best Colleges. It is a great business school. I have enjoyed all my business classes and teachers, and they are teaching me a lot., 203345=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 126455=Washburn does not have control of their classes and for someone with high anxiety it causes problems in the ability for me to pay attention when other students are talking during a lecture. I have such a low GPA the semester of Spring 2013 because the student medical service told me I had a blood fungus which my job said I could not work till it was cleared up; upon getting health Insurance I went to a different doctor and they said that was not the case; I was unable to get to many of my classes due to no funds for gas. I am taking online classes because their information taught in the classes is good information so I hope that online classes will allow me to do better work.}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Make sure you are prepared with specific questions that you need answered and don't be shy. you won't get any help if your shy. there are many people around campus who want to help you, so let them. Bang for the buck It is actually really reasonable considering how much college can be Am enjoying being here I absolutely love the school. it's my perfect fit. Am learning a lot Like any university you have to work for your grades the professors won't just give them to you like my experience in high school. Login to rate or flag the reviews Cody, KS 01/06/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 47 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Washburn is great
